summary: Elrond is a wise and ancient character in J.R.R. Tolkien's fantasy world, Middle-earth. He is a half-elf, with both human and elf ancestors, and possesses the powerful ring Vilya. Elrond has witnessed many historic events, including the war against the dark lord Sauron. He is known for his unique, archaic way of speaking, which reflects his age and wisdom. In stories like *The Hobbit* and *The Lord of the Rings*, Elrond guides and advises the main characters, often providing important counsel.
title: Elrond
